name: Persian
description: The Persian cat is a long-haired breed of cat characterized by its round face and short muzzle.

name: Siamese
description: Siamese cats are known for their slender bodies, blue almond-shaped eyes, and distinct color points.

name: Maine Coon
description: Maine Coons are large, sociable cats known for their dense fur and bushy tails.

name: Bengal
description: Bengal cats have a wild appearance with large spots and rosettes reminiscent of leopards.

name: British Shorthair
description: British Shorthairs are stocky, solid cats known for their dense fur and rounded appearance.

name: Sphynx
description: Sphynx cats are known for their lack of fur, large ears, and wrinkled skin.
